name: iVIBRATE - Controller Edition
description:
iVIBRATE Controller Edition

iVIBRATE Controller Edition is a FREE app that turns your Xbox One, Xbox 360 or PlayStation 4 controller into your own personal vibrator!

Features:

 

30 Vibrating Functions

10  different vibrating patterns! Plus 3 vibrating modes

 

Easy Controls

Easy to use controls all from your controller

 

Onscreen Controls

On the main menu so you always know what to press

 

9 Vibration Intensities

Increase and decrease vibration intensity as desired

 

3 Vibrating Modes

Rumble, vibrate or both allow you to customise the type of vibration you want

 

10 Vibration Patterns

To get the feel you desire

 

Dual locking system

Lock the controller via button press and/or with an on screen lock. Ensuring you never press an unwanted button during use. 

 

Controller Indicator

So you know if your controller is connected

 

Hot Swap Controllers

No need to restart the app when a controller is disconnected or when switching between different controllers. 

 

Scalable Windowed Mode

Windowed app that can be increased or decreased in size, allowing you to use other apps while still being able to see this one

 

FREE!

Completely free! No ads, no hidden pop ups, no micro-transactions.

*The vibrating functions and strength of this app vary depending on controller used. Other controllers outside of Xbox One, Xbox 360 & PS4 controllers may work but not guaranteed.*

*Xbox controllers do not work on MacOS version, however PS4 controllers do.

*Switch controllers may be compatible with this app but it has not been tested. Be sure to check out the other apps and games Kink Master Studios has to offer! With even more coming soon!
